CustomField.formula:
OR( AND( $Permission.Can_View_Operations_Support_Opportunity_Stages, OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Go Live"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Processing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Terminated") ) ), AND( $Permission.Can_View_General_Business_Opportunity_Stages, OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Frozen"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Processing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Terminated") ) ), AND( $Permission.Can_View_New_Business_Team_Opportunity_Stages, OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Frozen"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Processing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Terminated") ) ), AND( $Permission.Can_View_New_Business_Management_Opportunity_Stages, OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Frozen"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Processing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Terminated") ) ),
AND( NOT($Permission.Can_View_Operations_Support_Opportunity_Stages), NOT($Permission.Can_View_General_Business_Opportunity_Stages), NOT($Permission.Can_View_New_Business_Team_Opportunity_Stages), NOT($Permission.Can_View_New_Business_Management_Opportunity_Stages), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiation"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Compliance"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contract"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Homologation"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Go Live"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Frozen"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Processing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Terminated") ) ) )
CustomField.label: Can Read Only Negotiation
